title: For Server Owners
para1: Did you know that you can create custom Work Orders that will show up in the usual rotation? You can even set custom commands to run on completion!
para2: Check the custom quests folder in the config (config/megacorp/quests) for details!
para3: You may also be interested in the Vending Machine block which will allow you set up a Money shop. It must be enabled to show up, check the MegaCorp config for how.
